infoboxPara1: This is a not-for-profit project from open-water swimmers for open-water mers. We want to help you find your perfect swim events in Europe.
infoboxPara2: If you plan your vacations around open-water swim events, then this app is for you. Select the desired distance and date range, and out of {raceCount} races in {countriesCount} countries we show all matching events to you. Enable the "Show trip duration" switch to let the app calculate the time to get there by car.
infoboxPara3: Each {0} represents an event location. {1} are a cluster of events. Click on it to expand them. Click on the {2} icon to zoom to the event. Many of the races will have their race courses displayed.
infoboxPara4: Additions or corrections can be reported to {0} at {1}.
infoboxThanks: Thanks to Andrey Sheyko for his collaboration.
showTripDurationTooltip: Use your location to calculate trip duration to the events
tagline: Map of open-water swimming events in Europe.
tooltipSeeAll: Zoom out to see all events
